item.description:
Attend this meeting with Green Entrepreneurs and businesses to discuss the issues facing emerging businesses with sustainable models, services, and products. At this meeting you will have the opportunity to meet, collaborate and network with other "Green" and sustainable businesses to discover opportunities to work together, partner, and support the development of an emerging industry!! Bring your ideas and challenges to the table and share them with other entrepreneurs in an engaging discussion on the issues facing Green businesses today! Be sure to bring your business cards.

See you then! Space is limited, so RSVP today!

Meeting Agenda:

At this meeting we will be discussing What is happening around Boston! What government grants, tax credits, programs, etc. have been implemented for Sustainable businesses in Massachusetts. So everyone do your homework!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the stiff in a suit!
item.name: Green Entrepreneur Meeting
